Package com.stormpath.sdk.application

Interface Summary
AccountStoreMapping An AccountStoreMapping represents the assignment of an AccountStore (either a Group or Directory) to an Application.
AccountStoreMappingCriteria An AccountStoreMapping-specific Criteria class, enabling an AccountStoreMapping-specific fluentquery DSL.
AccountStoreMappingList A CollectionResource containing AccountStoreMapping instances.
AccountStoreMappingOptions<T> AccountStoreMapping-specific options that may be specified when retrieving AccountStoreMapping resources.
Application An Application instance represents a Stormpath registered application.
ApplicationCriteria An Application-specific Criteria class, enabling an Application-specific fluentquery DSL.
ApplicationList A CollectionResource containing Application instances.
ApplicationOptions<T> Application-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Application resources.
CreateApplicationRequest Represents an attempt to create a new Application record in Stormpath.
CreateApplicationRequestBuilder A Builder to construct CreateApplicationRequests.
 

Class Summary
AccountStoreMappings Static utility/helper methods for working with AccountStoreMapping resources.
Applications Static utility/helper methods for working with Application resources.
 

Enum Summary
ApplicationStatus
